CustomField.description: Indicates if Backlog/Up Next tickets are groomed and ready to be claimed from the 'Shared Backlog' pool of tickets. 'Groomed' tickets must include complete details for: Problem/Context (aka Description), Points, and Priority.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if Backlog/Up Next tickets are groomed and ready to be claimed from the 'Shared Backlog' pool of tickets. 'Groomed' tickets must include complete details for: Problem/Context (aka Description), Points, and Priority.
CustomField.label: Is Groomed?
